items.title: Sony’s ultralight INZONE wireless gaming mouse hits new all-time low ahead of fall Prime Day at $128
items.summary:
As part of early Prime Big Deal Days offers, Amazon has currently listed Sony’s new INZONE Mouse-A wireless gaming mouse for $128 shipped. This new model recently hit the scene alongside other INZONE gear carrying a $150 price tag, so you’re looking at a solid 15% markdown on it right now. This is the first time we’re tracking a deal on this model, and it’s now going for $22 less than its launch price from August. It’s among the lightest gaming mice out there, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

items.title: Early fall Prime Day game deals now live: Death Stranding 2, Neva, Demon’s Souls, Donkey Kong, more
items.summary:
Every morning for this week, our daily console game deal roundup is transitioning into the usual hub for all of the best deals going live for the fall Prime Day festivities. Best Buy, Target, Walmart, and Amazon are all running big-time sales this week and this will be the place to find all of the best PS5, Switch 1/2, and Xbox tiles as they go live. Today we are starting off with a series of a solid deals on PS5 titles that surfaced over the weekend ahead of tomorrow’s official start to Prime Big Deal Days:

  • Neva $25 (Reg. $35)
  • Death Stranding 2: On The Beach $50 (Reg. $70)
  • Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 $40 (Reg. $70)
  • The Last of Us Part I $30 (Reg. $70)
  • The Last of Us Part II Remastered $30 (Reg. $50)
  • Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart $30 (Reg. $70)
  • MLB The Show 25 $30 (Reg. $70)
  • Gran Turismo 7 $30 (Reg. $70)
  • God of War Ragnarök $30 (Reg. $70)
  • LEGO Horizon Adventures $20 (Reg. $60)
  • Demon’s Souls $30 (Reg. $70)
  • Rise of the Ronin $40 (Reg. $70)
  • And even more…

items.title: Best Buy’s Techtober sale delivers up to $600 off Copilot+ PCs, gaming laptops, more from $230
items.summary:
Best Buy has kicked off its Techtober sale to take on Amazon’s fall Prime Day, offering wide-ranging deals on PCs, Apple gear, home appliances, and more. The retailer is also dishing out some huge deals on Windows Copilot+ PCs and gaming laptops, and the prices for these start at $229.99 shipped. There are even some gaming PCs in the mix with NVIDIA’s latest RTX 50-series GPUs. All these machines are in brand-new condition, many of which are either hitting fresh lows or are back to their lowest prices. We’ve highlighted some of the favorites from the sale below for you to check out.

This particular model debuted just last week at $120, and this marks the first-ever discount we’ve tracked for it. Today’s deal knocks $30 off the launch price, setting a new best price to beat. The MX Master 4 for Mac is optimized for Apple/macOS users and comes in Space Black and Silver White colors, and they’re both down to the $90 low today. The standard version comes in slightly different shades and a wireless receiver dongle is also available at $90 low. Head below for more details.

Amazon is now offering the best price yet on the weird and wonderful Death Stranding 2: On The Beach alongside price drops on a host of first-party PS5 titles like Marvel’s Spider-Man 2, The Last of Us titles, Gran Turismo 7, Demon’s Souls, Rise of the Ronin, and more. You’re looking at up to 57% off and you’ll find some highlights detailed below:

  • Death Stranding 2: On The Beach $50 (Reg. $70)
  • Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 $40 (Reg. $70)
  • The Last of Us Part I $30 (Reg. $70)
  • The Last of Us Part II Remastered $30 (Reg. $50)
  • Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart $30 (Reg. $70)
  • MLB The Show 25 $30 (Reg. $70)
  • Gran Turismo 7 $30 (Reg. $70)
  • God of War Ragnarök $30 (Reg. $70)
  • LEGO Horizon Adventures $20 (Reg. $60)
  • Demon’s Souls $30 (Reg. $70)
  • Rise of the Ronin $40 (Reg. $70)
  • And even more…

Many of these deals are also live as part of the Target Circle Week sale as well – be sure to create/sign in to a FREE Circle account first.
